plugin-data.name: HTML Code
plugin-data.description: Add HTML, CSS or JavaScript code in the head metadata, header or footer of your site.

insert-code-in-the-theme-inside-the-tag-: Insert code in the theme inside the tag <head> </head>
insert-code-in-the-theme-at-the-top: Insert code in the theme at the top.
insert-code-in-the-theme-at-the-bottom: Insert code in the theme at the bottom.
insert-code-in-the-admin-area-inside-the: Insert code in the admin area inside the tag <head> </head>
insert-code-in-the-admin-area-at-the-top: Insert code in the admin area at the top.
insert-code-in-the-admin-area-at-the-bot: Insert code in the admin area at the bottom.
